cont.entity_a: Nikon D2xs is like new and works flawlessly.
Performs very well for an older pro body.
Very tough and reliable, lasting without issues.
Capable of producing sharp 16x24 prints or larger with a good lens.
First autofocus camera that focuses faster than the user.
cont.entity_b: Finicky and difficult to focus in imperfect lighting.

cont.entity_a: Excellent low ISO performance and overall outstanding image quality. Picture quality is not as good as the D300.
Amazon's price is high compared to other platforms like eBay.

cont.entity_b: The viewfinder is a little dim, and focusing can be tricky with included lenses.
E-300 is intuitive and easy to use. Menus are easy to navigate, and buttons are well laid out. Good camera for both novices and pros.
Feels physically better than the Rebel or comparable Nikon. Rubber-coated aluminum chassis and smooth-working controls.
Focal plane dust removal system is unmatched by Canon and Nikon.
High performance Kodak KAF8300CE CCD imager chip.
There is a sound when photographing.
